article_title: Niagara County's tentative 2016 budget includes tax decrease

article_metadata.author: BY RIKKI CASON rikki.cason@lockportjournal.com

og.description: LOCKPORT — Taxpayers will likely see a slight decrease in their Niagara County tax bill next year.
